screen.dataStatement: select 1 as something, 'hello' as somethingElse union select 2 as something, 'goodbye' as somethingElse
select 1 as mainField union all select 1 as mainField
select '{0}' As ChecklistTemplateID, '{0}' As FlockChecklistID, null as Checklist_DetailTypeID
select convert(int,null) as LocationID, convert(int,null) as LayerHouseID, convert(bit,1) as ShowFlockChecklist
select GETDATE() as ReportDate, convert(int,null) as LocationID, convert(int,null) as ChecklistTemplateID
select convert(int,null) as HatcheryID, GETDATE() as startdate, convert(date,null) as enddate
SELECT LocationID FROM Location WHERE LocationID = {1}

screen.displayStyle: Security For Screen and Menu Item

screen.displayName: Support - Activity - Summary by IP address
